# Interface LLMNodeFactoryInterface

Interface for LLM node factory parameters.

interface LLMNodeFactoryInterface {  
executionConfig: [LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface);  
id: string;  
llmConfig: [RemoteLLMConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_config.RemoteLLMConfigInterface) | [LocalLLMConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_config.LocalLLMConfigInterface);  
stream?: boolean;  
}

#### Hierarchy ([View Summary](/hierarchy#graph/nodes/node_factory.LLMNodeFactoryInterface))

  * [NodeFactoryInterface](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface)
    * LLMNodeFactoryInterface



##### Index

### Properties

executionConfig id llmConfig stream?

## Properties

### executionConfig

executionConfig: [LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface](./graph_nodes_builtin_node_execution_config.LLMNodeExecutionConfigPropsInterface)

Execution configuration for the LLM node

### id

id: string

Unique identifier for the node

Inherited from [NodeFactoryInterface](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface).[id](./graph_nodes_node_factory.NodeFactoryInterface#id)

### llmConfig

llmConfig: [RemoteLLMConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_config.RemoteLLMConfigInterface) | [LocalLLMConfigInterface](./primitives_llm_config.LocalLLMConfigInterface)

Configuration for the LLM (local or remote)

### `Optional`stream

stream?: boolean

Whether to stream the results (default: false)
